Methods

| Edit this page View Source

GetLevelData(UserXpStats)

Calculates and returns the user's current level, the XP they have at this level, and the XP required to advance to the next level.

Declaration
public static (int Level, int LevelXp, int LevelRequiredXp) GetLevelData(this UserXpStats stats)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UserXpStats stats

The UserXpStats instance to calculate level data for. Represents the user's current XP stats.
Returns
Type Description
(int Level, int LevelXp, int LevelRequiredXp)

A tuple containing three integers:

  • The first integer represents the user's current level.
  • The second integer represents the XP the user has at the current level.
  • The third integer represents the XP required to advance to the next level.
Remarks

This method calculates the required XP for each level using a formula based on the base XP required for level 1, and increments the level until the total XP is less than the sum of the required XP for the next level.
